label: Dev Tools
title: Development Tools & Software
description: I use a suite of professional tools to ensure efficient development, robust version control, and seamless deployment.
points: Proficient in Git for version control and collaborative development.
Utilise VS Code with custom configurations for an optimised workflow.
Experience with Docker for creating consistent development environments.
Skilled in using Postman for API development, testing, and validation.

label: Cloud & Infrastructure
title: Cloud & Infrastructure
description: I design and manage cloud infrastructure to ensure scalability, reliability, and performance.

Implemented CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.
Monitored system health and performance, ensuring high availability.

label: AI & Automation
title: AI & Automation

points: Developed custom AI models for data analysis and prediction.
